ys.succinct.util

Class SamplingBitVector

  • java.lang.Object
    • ys.succinct.util.AbstractRank
      • ys.succinct.util.IntRank
        • ys.succinct.util.SamplingBitVector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BitSet, BitVector, Rank, Select

    public class SamplingBitVector
extends IntRank
implements BitVector
    A plain bit vector that provides the rank/select operations. The rank queries are supported by IntRank. The select operation is implemented by using the sampling technique (single directory).
    Author:
    Yauheni Shahun

      Constructs a bit vector from the given bit set.

    • Method Detail

      • select

        public int select(int index)
        Description copied from interface: Select
        Gets the position of the i-th 1 bit in the bit set.
        Specified by:
        select in interface Select
        Parameters:
        index - the ordinal number of 1 bit (0-based)
        Returns:
        0-based index of the 1 bit or -1 if i is greater than or equal to the rank of the bit set
